Functions

chunk 

@function chunk ($list, $size) { ... }

Description

Chunks $list into $size large lists

Parameters

Name Description Type Default value
$list list to chunk List —
$size length of lists Number —

Returns

List, Bool

Throws

  • $size is not a number for chunk.

Description

Returns whether $list contains $value

Since

Parameters

Name Description Type Default value

$value value to look for Any —

Returns

Bool

explode 

@function explode ($string, $separator) { ... }

Description

Explode $string into a list using $delimiter as a delimiter

Since

1.0.0

Parameters

Name Description Type Default value
$string string to explode String —
$separator string to use as a delimiter String —

Returns

List, Bool

Throws

  • $string is not a string for explode.

  • $delimiter is not a string for explode.

insert-nth 

@function insert-nth ($list, $index, $value) { ... }

Description

Adds $value at $index in $list

Parameters

Name Description Type Default value
$list list to update List —
$index index to add Number —
$value value to add Any —

Returns

List, Bool

Throws

  • List index $index is not a number for insert-nth.

  • List index $index must be a non-zero integer for insert-nth.

shuffle (aliased as randomize )

Description

Since

Parameters

Returns

slice 

@function slice ($list, $start, $end) { ... }

Description

Slices $list between $start and $end

Parameters

Name Description Type Default value
$list list to slice List —
$start start index Number —
$end ) - end index Number —

Returns

List, Bool

Throws

  • List indexes $start and $end must be numbers for slice.

  • Start index has to be lesser than or equals to the end index for slice.

  • List indexes must be non-zero integers for slice.

  • Start index has to be lesser than or equal to list length for slice.

  • End index has to be lesser than or equal to list length for slice.

Used by

  • tail

sort (aliased as order ) 

@function sort ($list, $order) { ... }

Description

Sorts values of $list using quick-sort algorithm respecting $order

Parameters

Name Description Type Default value
$list list to sort List —
$order order to respect List —

Returns

List

Requires

  • str-compare

Parameters

Bool

walk 

@function walk ($list, $function, $args) { ... }

Description

Apply $function to every item from $list passing $args as parameters

Parameters

Name Description Type Default value
$list list to update List —
$function function to call on each value String —
$args optional function arguments ArgList —

Returns

List, Bool

Throws

  • There is no $function function.
